trans-unit.source: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.
trans-unit.target: 表示內含任何類型之單一內容的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> can contain any type of common language runtime object (such as a string or a <xref:System.DateTime> object) or a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object (such as a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>可以包含任何類型的 common language runtime 物件 (例如字串或<xref:System.DateTime>物件) 或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add rich content to controls such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您將豐富的內容控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows four buttons whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is set to one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示四個按鈕的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性設定為下列其中之一：

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: 字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains other <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>包含其他控制項<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: ![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons")
trans-unit.target: ![四個按鈕](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四個按鈕")

trans-unit.source: Four buttons with different types of content
trans-unit.target: 四個按鈕與不同類型的內容

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> has a limited default style.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>有限的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If you want to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要加強控制項的外觀，您可以建立新<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Another typical scenario is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> to show more information about an item selected in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的另一個典型的案例是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>來顯示有關選取之項目的詳細資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 繫結至集合並顯示選取項目基礎資訊](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create the four buttons shown in the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立四個按鈕顯示在 < 備註 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `<Button.Content>` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: 雖然[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]範例中的版本無法使用`<Button.Content>`周圍的每個按鈕內容的標記，則不需要。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 概觀 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to make a style for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> so that the control has an enhanced visual appearance.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何讓樣式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>使控制項具有增強的視覺外觀。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified object as the child of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的物件做為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> 的子系。

trans-unit.source: The string to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的字串。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified text string to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的文字字串加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the control's content.
trans-unit.target: 包含控制項之內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is of type <xref:System.Object>, there are no restrictions on what you can put in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性屬於型別<xref:System.Object>，沒有任何限制，在您可以放入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> is displayed by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, which is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>，這是在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>在其預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> displays <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: Text or a single object.
trans-unit.target: 文字或單一物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create four <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> controls with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> set to one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立四個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>控制與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>設為下列其中之一：

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: 字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains other <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>包含其他控制項<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `<Button.Content>` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: 雖然[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]範例中的版本無法使用`<Button.Content>`周圍的每個按鈕內容的標記，則不需要。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 概觀 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the four buttons created in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示在上述範例中建立的四個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: ![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons")
trans-unit.target: ![四個按鈕](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四個按鈕")

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定複合字串，這個字串會指定在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 屬性顯示為字串的情況下，如何格式化這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 複合字串，指定在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 屬性顯示為字串的情況下，如何格式化這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies the format of <xref:System.DateTime> objects by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Style> and applying the <xref:System.Windows.Style> to two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> objects, which inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會指定的格式<xref:System.DateTime>物件藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Style>及套用<xref:System.Windows.Style>兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>物件，繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data template used to display the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> 內容的資料範本。

trans-unit.source: A data template.
trans-unit.target: 資料範本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to specify the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>至指定的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資料範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *resourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *resourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: 識別如何將參考的範本資源，可能是標記延伸`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: *styleResourceKey*
trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey*

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the requested template selector.
trans-unit.target: 識別要求的範本選擇器的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考中現有的資源<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 屬性項目語法是可行，但不是建議。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[內嵌樣式和樣板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to create a content template and apply the template to a content control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立內容的範本，並將範本套用至內容控制項。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定一個樣板選取器，讓應用程式撰寫者可以提供自訂的樣板選取邏輯。

trans-unit.source: A data template selector.
trans-unit.target: 資料範本選取器。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> when you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to apply based on the properties of each data object.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>有一個以上<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>相同類型的物件，而且您想要提供您自己選擇的邏輯<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>套用根據每個資料物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果您有不同的物件類型與您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: If you do that, then there is no need to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您這麼做，則不需要建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> or a data converter.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果您有物件類型相同，但具有不同的屬性時，您也可以考慮使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>或資料轉換。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立範本選擇器，請建立繼承自類別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element.
trans-unit.target: 您的類別定義之後，您可以指派給您的項目範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> properties are set, then this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，則會忽略這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *ResourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: 識別如何將參考的範本資源，可能是標記延伸`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: *TemplateSelectorKey*
trans-unit.target: *TemplateSelectorKey*

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the requested template selector.
trans-unit.target: 識別要求的範本選擇器的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考中現有的資源<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example binds the selected item in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中會繫結中的選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>，後者繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a value below 5, the value of the selected item appears in a black square in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取低於 5 的值時，選取之項目的值會出現在中的黑色方塊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a value that is 5 or above, the value appears in a green ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取的值是 5 或以上的值會出現在綠色橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The example accomplishes this by creating two <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>, which is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property and chooses the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> based on the value of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 此範例可完成此作業藉由建立兩個<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>物件和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>，會設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>屬性並選擇適當<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>根據選取之項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> contains content.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> 是否包含內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> has content; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" /> 有內容則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is `null`, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性是`null`，這個屬性會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.HasContent%2A> property to determine whether a content control contains content.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.HasContent%2A>屬性來判斷內容控制項是否包含內容。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.HasContent" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.HasContent" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator to the content control's logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得內容控制項之邏輯子項目的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 屬性的舊值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 屬性變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The old value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat" /> 的舊值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat" /> 的新值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> 屬性的舊值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> 屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> 屬性變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> 屬性的舊值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> 屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> 屬性變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否應該保存 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property should be persisted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 屬性應該要保存，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您開發的設計工具通常呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>或開發您自己的控制項加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
